name: Seeds Life
description:
Winner of the Gecko Game Jam #3

You are a one of a kind plant : as time goes by, you evolve and change.

Each of the mutations has his own gameplay. Find your way throught the 2 levels and be careful, when you reach your last evolution, you have to plant yourself in the ground to be reborn anew.

Controls :

  • WASD / Arrows: Move
  • Space barre and the mouse for contextual actions

Credits:

  • Gauthier Picot : Concept and a lot of love
  • Aubry Gieger : Game and Level designer
  • Antoine Semblat (Twitter / Patreon) : Game designer and Developper
  • Auréilien Montero (Twitter) : Sound Designer & composer
  • Gautier Di Fusco : 2D Artist
